metadata.title: CVE-2017-4967 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in these Pivotal RabbitMQ versions: all 3.4.xversions, all 3.5.x versions, and 3.6.x versions prior to 3.6.9; and theseRabbitMQ for PCF versions: all 1.5.x versions, 1.6.x versions prior to1.6.18, and 1.7.x versions prior to 1.7.15. Several forms in the RabbitMQmanagement UI are vulnerable to XSS attacks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-4967` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rabbitmq-server - 3.6.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.10-1').
